info.name: Taskify API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the taskify.

request.description: This endpoint allows an authenticated user or client to update their FCM token for push notifications.
This endpoint allows a new user to sign up by providing necessary details.

request.description: This endpoint allows a user to log in by providing their email and password. Upon successful authentication, a token is returned for accessing protected resources.
This endpoint allows a user or client to request a password reset link by providing their email and account type.
This endpoint allows a user or client to reset their password using a valid token.
This endpoint returns the profile information of the currently authenticated user. The user must be authenticated to access their profile details.

item.name: Update the profile picture of a logged-in user or a specified user/client.

formdata.description: The ID of the user or client whose profile picture is being updated. Required if `type` is provided.
The type of the entity whose profile picture is being updated. Must be either 'user' or 'client'.

request.description:
This endpoint allows the authenticated user to update their profile picture.
If both `id` and `type` are provided, the profile picture for the specified user or client will be updated.
If not, the profile picture of the logged-in user will be updated.

item.name: Update the profile details of a logged-in user.

variable.description: The ID of the user whose profile is being updated.

request.description: This endpoint allows the authenticated user to update their profile details such as name, email, address, and other relevant information.

item.name: Delete account of a logged-in user.

request.description: This endpoint allows the authenticated user to delete their account.

item.name: List or search users with birthdays today or upcoming.

query.description: Optional. The search term to filter users by first name or last name or combination of first name and last name or User ID or date of birth.
Optional. The sort order for the `dob` column. Acceptable values are `ASC` or `DESC`. Default is `ASC`.
Optional. The number of days from today to consider for upcoming birthdays. Default is 30.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The number of results to return per page. Default is 15.
Optional. The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default is 0.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of users with birthdays occurring today or within a specified range of days. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

item.name: List or search users with work anniversaries today or upcoming.

query.description: Optional. The search term to filter users by first name or last name or combination of first name and last name or User ID or date of joining.
Optional. The sort order for the `doj` column. Acceptable values are `ASC` or `DESC`. Default is `ASC`.
Optional. The number of days from today to consider for upcoming work anniversaries. Default is 30.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The number of results to return per page. Default is 15.
Optional. The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default is 0.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of users with work anniversaries occurring today or within a specified range of days. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

item.name: List members currently on leave or scheduled to be on leave.

query.description: Optional. The search term to filter users by first name or last name or combination of first name and last name or User ID or date of joining.
Optional. The field to sort by. Acceptable values are `from_date` and `to_date`. Default is `from_date`.
Optional. The sort order. Acceptable values are `ASC` or `DESC`. Default is `ASC`.
Optional. The number of days from today to consider for upcoming leave. Default is 30.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The specific user IDs to filter the results.
Optional. The number of results to return per page. Default is 15.
Optional. The number of results to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default is 0.

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of members who are currently on leave or scheduled to be on leave within a specified range of days.
The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

response.body:
{
  "error": false,
  "message": "Members on leave retrieved successfully.",
  "total": 1,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "member": "John Doe",
      "photo": "http://example.com/storage/photos/john_doe.jpg",
      "from_date": "Mon, 2024-07-15",
      "to_date": "Fri, 2024-07-19",
      "type": "Full",
      "duration": "5 days",
      "days_left": 0
    }
  ]
}

request.description: This endpoint retrieves workspace-specific statistics related to projects, tasks, users, clients, todos, and meetings. The user must be authenticated and have the necessary permissions to manage (if applicable) each respective module.

query.description: optional The search term to filter projects by title or id.
optional The field to sort by. Defaults to "id". Sortable fields include: id, title, status, priority, start_date, end_date, budget, created_at, and updated_at.
optional The sort order, either "ASC" or "DESC". Defaults to "DESC".
optional An array of status IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of status IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of user IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of user IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of user IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of client IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of client IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of priority IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of priority IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of tag IDs to filter projects by.
optional An array of tag IDs to filter projects by.
optional The start date range's start in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional The start date range's end in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional The end date range's start in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional The end date range's end in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional Filter projects marked as favorites.
optional The number of projects per page for pagination.
optional The offset for pagination, indicating the starting point of results.

variable.description: optional The ID of the project to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of projects based on various filters. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request allows filtering by status, user, client, priority, tag, date ranges, and other parameters.

body.raw: {"title":"New Website Launch","status_id":1,"priority_id":2,"start_date":"2024-08-01","end_date":"2024-08-31","budget":"5000.00","task_accessibility":"project_users","description":"A project to launch a new company website.","note":"Ensure all team members are informed.","user_id":"[1, 2, 3]","client_id":"[5, 6]","tag_ids":"[10, 11]","clientCanDiscuss":"on"}

request.description: This endpoint creates a new project with the provided details. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request validates various fields, including title, status, priority, dates, and task accessibility.

body.raw: {"id":1,"title":"Updated Project Title","status_id":2,"priority_id":3,"budget":"5000.00","task_accessibility":"assigned_users","start_date":"2024-08-01","end_date":"2024-08-31","description":"Updated project description.","note":"Updated note for the project.","user_id":"[2, 3]","client_id":"[5, 6]","tag_ids":"[10, 11]","clientCanDiscuss":"on"}

request.description: This endpoint updates an existing project with the provided details. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request validates various fields, including title, status, priority, dates, and task accessibility.

item.name: Update the favorite status of a project.

variable.description: The ID of the project to update.

request.description: This endpoint updates whether a project is marked as a favorite or not. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

item.name: Update the pinned status of a project.

variable.description: The ID of the project to update.

request.description: This endpoint updates whether a project is marked as pinned or not. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

item.name: Update the status of a project.

variable.description: The ID of the project whose status is to be updated.

request.description: This endpoint updates the status of a specified project. The user must be authenticated and have permission to set the new status. A notification will be sent to all users and clients associated with the project.

variable.description: The ID of the project to be deleted.

request.description: This endpoint deletes a project based on the provided ID. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

variable.description: The ID of the project whose status timeline is to be retrieved.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves the status change history of a project, sorted in descending order.
This endpoint creates a new milestone for a specified project. The user must be authenticated and have permission to create milestones.

item.name: Get a list of milestones for a project.

query.description: optional Search for milestones by title, ID, cost, or description.
optional Field to sort by (default: "id").
optional Sorting order (ASC/DESC, default: "DESC").
optional Filter by milestone statuses.
date optional Filter milestones starting from this date.
date optional Filter milestones ending at this date.
date optional Filter milestones with a start date after this date.
date optional Filter milestones with a start date before this date.
date optional Filter milestones with an end date after this date.
date optional Filter milestones with an end date before this date.
optional Number of records per page.

variable.description: The ID of the project whose milestones are to be retrieved.

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves all milestones associated with a given project.
It supports searching, filtering, and sorting functionalities.

response.body:
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 12,
      "title": "Design Phase",
      "status": Complete,
      "progress": "75",
      "cost": "₹1,500.00",
      "start_date": "2025-03-10",
      "end_date": "2025-03-20",

      "created_at": "2025-03-01",
      "updated_at": "2025-03-05",

    }
  ],
  "total": 1
}

item.name: Get details of a specific milestone.

variable.description: The ID of the milestone to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves details of a specific milestone by its ID.

variable.description: The ID of the milestone to be updated.

request.description: This endpoint updates a specified milestone. The user must be authenticated and have permission to modify the milestone.

variable.description: The ID of the milestone to delete.

request.description: This endpoint deletes a specified milestone. The user must be authenticated and have permission to delete milestones.

variable.description: The ID of the project to add a comment to.

formdata.description: The type of model being commented on (e.g., "Task", "Project").
The ID of the model being commented on.
The comment text.
optional The ID of the parent comment (for replies).

request.description:
This endpoint allows authenticated users to add comments to a specific model (e.g., tasks, projects).
Users can also attach files and mention other users.

item.name: Get details of a specific comment.

variable.description: The ID of the comment to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves details of a specific comment by its ID, including any attachments.
This endpoint updates a specified comment. The user must be authenticated and have permission to modify the comment.

query.description: The ID of the comment to delete.

request.description:
This endpoint deletes a specified comment and removes its attachments from storage.
The user must be authenticated and have permission to delete comments.

item.name: Upload media files to a project.

formdata.description: The ID of the project to which media files are being uploaded.

request.description: This endpoint allows authenticated users to upload media files related to a project.

query.description: optional A search query to filter media files by name, ID, or upload date.
optional The column to sort by (default: "id").
optional The sorting order: "ASC" or "DESC" (default: "DESC").

variable.description: The ID of the project whose media files are to be retrieved.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves all media files associated with a specific project, including sorting and search capabilities.

variable.description: The ID of the delete medium.
The ID of the media file to delete.

request.description: This endpoint deletes a specified media file associated with a project. The user must be authenticated and have permission to delete media files.

query.description: optional The search term to filter tasks by title or id.
optional The field to sort by. Defaults to "id". Sortable fields include: id, title, project, status, priority, start_date, due_date, created_at, and updated_at.
optional The sort order, either "ASC" or "DESC". Defaults to "DESC".
optional An array of status IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of status IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of user IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of user IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of user IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of client IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of client IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of priority IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of priority IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of project IDs to filter tasks by.
optional An array of project IDs to filter tasks by.
optional The start date range's start in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional The start date range's end in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional The end date range's start in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional The end date range's end in YYYY-MM-DD format.
optional Filter projects marked as favorites.
optional The number of tasks per page for pagination.
optional The offset for pagination, indicating the starting point of results.

variable.description: optional The ID of the task to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of tasks based on various filters. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request allows filtering by multiple statuses, users, clients, projects, date ranges, and other parameters.

This endpoint updates the details of an existing task. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request validates various fields including title, status, priority, start and due dates, and optional notes. It also handles user assignments and notifies relevant parties of any status changes.

request.description: This endpoint updates whether a task is marked as a favorite or not. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

request.description: This endpoint updates whether a task is marked as pinned or not. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

variable.description: The ID of the task whose status is to be updated.

request.description: This endpoint updates the status of a specified task. The user must be authenticated and have permission to set the new status. A notification will be sent to all users and clients associated with the task.

request.description: This endpoint updates the priority of a specified task. The user must be authenticated and have permission to set the new priority.

request.description: This endpoint deletes a task based on the provided ID. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves the status change history of a task, sorted in descending order.

request.description: This endpoint allows authenticated users to upload media files and associate them with a specific task.

optional The column to sort by (default: "id").
optional The sorting order: "ASC" or "DESC" (default: "DESC").

item.name: Get the Income vs Expense Statistics.

request.description:
This endpoint provides the Income vs Expense Statistics.
The user must be authenticated to access this data.

query.description: optional The search term to filter statuses by title or id.
optional The field to sort by. Defaults to "id". Sortable fields include: id, title, color, created_at, and updated_at.
optional The sort order, either "ASC" or "DESC". Defaults to "DESC".
optional The number of statuses per page for pagination.
optional The offset for pagination, indicating the starting point of results.

variable.description: optional The ID of the status to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of statuses based on various filters. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request allows searching and sorting by different parameters.
This endpoint allows authenticated users to create a new status with a unique slug and assign roles to it.
This endpoint allows authenticated users to update a status, including modifying the title, color, and associated roles.

item.name: Get details of a specific status.

variable.description: The ID of the status to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific status, including the roles associated with it.

variable.description: The ID of the status to delete.

request.description:
This endpoint allows authenticated users to delete a specific status. Before deletion,
all associated projects and tasks will be updated to have a default status ID of `0`.

query.description: optional The search term to filter priorities by title or id.
optional The field to sort by. Defaults to "id". Sortable fields include: id, title, color, created_at, and updated_at.
optional The sort order, either "ASC" or "DESC". Defaults to "DESC".
optional The number of priorities per page for pagination.
optional The offset for pagination, indicating the starting point of results.

variable.description: optional The ID of the priority to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of priorities based on various filters. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request allows searching and sorting by different parameters.
This endpoint allows authenticated users to create a new priority with a unique slug.
This endpoint allows authenticated users to update a priority, including modifying the title and color.

item.name: Get details of a specific priority.

variable.description: The ID of the priority to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific priority.

variable.description: The ID of the priority to delete.

request.description:
This endpoint allows authenticated users to delete a specific priority.
Before deletion, all associated projects and tasks will have their `priority_id` set to `null`.

query.description: optional The search term to filter tags by title or id.
optional The field to sort by. Defaults to "id". Sortable fields include: id, title, created_at, and updated_at.
optional The sort order, either "ASC" or "DESC". Defaults to "DESC".
optional The number of tags per page for pagination.
optional The offset for pagination, indicating the starting point of results.

variable.description: optional The ID of the tag to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of tags based on various filters. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request allows searching and sorting by different parameters.
This endpoint creates a new todo item with the specified title, color. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.
This endpoint updates an existing tag item with the specified title, color. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

variable.description: The ID of the todo to be deleted.

request.description: This endpoint deletes a tag item based on the provided ID. The user must be authenticated to perform this action.

query.description: optional The search term to filter users by id, first name, last name, phone, or email.
optional The field to sort by. Defaults to "id". Sortable fields include: id, phone, dob, doj, created_at, and updated_at.
optional The sort order, either "ASC" or "DESC". Defaults to "DESC".
optional The status ID to filter users by, either 0 or 1.
optional The role IDs to filter users by.
optional The role IDs to filter users by.
optional The type of filter to apply, either "project" or "task".
optional The ID associated with the type filter.
optional The number of users per page for pagination.
optional The offset for pagination, indicating the starting point of results.

variable.description: optional The ID of the user to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of users based on various filters. The user must be authenticated to perform this action. The request allows filtering by status, search term, role, type, type_id, and other parameters.

formdata.description: The first name of the user.
The last name of the user.
The email address of the user.
The password for the user.
The password confirmation.
nullable The address of the user.
nullable The phone number of the user.
nullable The country code for the phone number.
nullable The ISO code for the phone number.
nullable The city of the user.
nullable The state of the user.
nullable The country of the user.
nullable The ZIP code of the user.
nullable The date of birth of the user in the format specified in the general settings.
nullable The date of joining in the format specified in the general settings.
The ID of the role for the user.

0 or 1. If Deactivated (0), the user won't be able to log in to their account.
Can only specify if `is_admin_or_has_all_data_access` is true for the logged-in user, else 0 will be considered by default.

0 or 1. If Yes (1) is selected, the user will receive a verification link via email.
Can only specify if `is_admin_or_has_all_data_access` is true for the logged-in user, else 1 will be considered by default.
